entry.title: Data Science Talk and Q&A
entry.content:
Speaker: Mando Rotman

Senior manager Analytics at IG&H, Consulting, former data science professional at IBM Watson.

An introduction to data science, covering topics such as basic background knowledge and cutting-edge technology demonstrations.

A good lecture to help students understand the picture of the field of data analysis.
entry.summary: Speaker: Mando Rotman Senior manager Analytics at IG&H, Consulting, former data science professional at IBM Watson. An introduction to data science, covering topics such as basic background knowledge and cutting-edge technology demonstrations. A good lecture to help students understand the picture of the field of data analysis.
